title: Avid Torq v2.0.3 WiN-UNION [deepstatus]
description:
Avid Torq v2.0.3 WiN



TORQ software is currently not available for sale. While inMusic will continue to provide support and updates for customers who have purchased TORQ software, we will no longer promote or sell TORQ software globally. inMusic is, however, exploring TORQ's features and design, and we are actively seeking new ways to support our DJ customers across all brands, both currently and with future products. Current TORQ owners will receive communication from inMusic as updates, bug fixes, and stability improvements for TORQ become available.











DJ Performance Software from the Makers of Pro Tools

Torq 2.0 DJ software takes you beyond beat matching and into the future of DJ performance and real-time production. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t just spin tracksÃ¢â‚¬â€reinvent them. Take advantage of all four decks to create unique, complex, and dynamic mixes. Develop your own sound using high-quality, innovative effects and a powerful built-in sampler. Go beyond crossfading by transitioning between tracks in exciting new ways using the innovative new Traq MorphÃ¢â€žÂ¢ feature. You can easily integrate Torq 2.0 with turntables, CD decks, and a variety of popular DJ controllersÃ¢â‚¬â€or run the software on its own. Designed for rock-solid stability and peak performance, Torq 2.0 gives you unlimited ways to create your own sound on the dance floor, in the studio, and beyond.



Features

  * Cue, beat-match, and mix digital audio files (including MP3, AIFF, WAV, WMA, AAC, and CD audio )
  * Organize digital audio files ( including iTunes libraries ) into an updated, easily searchable database that can handle tens of thousands of tracks
  * Use crates and playlists to organize tracks
  * 4 full-featured decks* for loading and playing files, each with EQ, level control, headphone cueing, and crossfade
  * 6 cue points
  * Standalone functionalityÃ¢â‚¬â€no hardware peripherals required*








Additional Compatibility Information:


Torq 2.0 is open and supports any ASIO or CoreAudio compatible audio interface.

Avid/M-Audio hardware with native support:

   Xponent
   X-Session Pro

3rd party hardware with native support:

   Allen & Heath Xone 4D
   Behringer BCD3000
   Denon S-3700
   Denon HC-4500
   Native Instruments Kontrol S4 (Partial Support - control surface feedback not yet implemented)
   Numark NS7
   Numark V7 (Partial Support - not fully mapped)
   Reloop Digital Jockey 2
   Vestax VCI-300
   Numark NS6
   Numark Mixtrack
   Numark Mixtrack Pro



Minimum System Requirements:

   Windows 7 32 / 64 (recommended), Windows XP* ( SP3 ), or Vista 32/64 ( SP2 )
   Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
   2 GB RAM
   1280 x 800 or 1366 x 768 screen resolution
   500 MB** available hard drive space
   Multi-channel audio interface recommended

* Home and Professional only, Windows XP Media Center Edition, and Windows XP-64-bit are not supported
** Total hard drive space requirements depend on the size of your music library
